title: rePay - Payment App
description:
rePAY is a modern payment app clone with a seamless user experience and powerful features:

  • Authentication: Users can easily sign up and sign in with secure authorization using Zod and JWT.
  • Backend: Built using the high-performance framework Hono for fast and scalable backend operations.
  • Frontend: Developed with React, offering a smooth and responsive user interface.
  • Deployment: Fully deployed on Cloudflare Workers, ensuring reliable and fast access globally.
  • Styling: Utilizes Tailwind CSS for easy and efficient styling, and Framer Motion for stunning animations and transitions.
  • Money Transfer: Users can effortlessly send money to each other, making it a practical and functional payment solution.
  • UI Features: The app boasts great UI animations, responsive design, and a dynamic theme toggling feature.

This app combines functionality and user experience, creating a highly interactive and visually appealing payment platform.

title: Medium - Blog App
description:
The Medium - Blog App is a blogging platform where users can write, edit, and share blogs seamlessly:


  • Authentication: Integrated secure user authentication using JWT and Zod.
  • Backend: Built using Hono to ensure fast and efficient handling of blog posts.
  • Frontend: Crafted with React, providing a responsive and interactive blogging interface.
  • Deployment: Deployed on Cloudflare Workers for scalability and reliability.
  • Styling: Styled using Tailwind CSS to ensure a clean and modern look across devices.
  • Content Creation: Features a rich text editor for blog writing with formatting options.

This app offers a simple, elegant, and intuitive blogging experience.
